text: ਸਲੋਕੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੨ ॥

translation.text: Shalok, Second Mehl:

transliteration.text: salōk mahalā 2 .

melody.description: There is no melody or mood associated with this line, which may be because it is the preamble to the hymn, or is not meant to be read in any particular melody or mood

author.author: None
author.description: There is no author associated with this line, as it may be the preamble to the hymn

text: ਚਾਕਰੁ ਲਗੈ ਚਾਕਰੀ ਨਾਲੇ ਗਾਰਬੁ ਵਾਦੁ ॥

translation.text: If a servant performs service, while being vain and argumentative,

transliteration.text: chākar lagai chākarī nālē gārab vād .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

author.author: Guru Angad Dev
author.description:
Guru Angad Dev [1504 - 1552], originally called Bhai Lehna, was born at Harike, a small village in the Ferozepur district. His father was named Pheru and worked as a small businessman.

Bhai Lehna always did everything that Guru Nanak asked, which is why Guru Nanak renamed Bhai Lehna as his Ang or limb of his body.

Guru Angad Dev simplified the old Punjabi characters into a new alphabet, called Gurmukhi. He thus gave the people the gift of literature. He took great interest in the education of children and opened several schools.

text: ਗਲਾ ਕਰੇ ਘਣੇਰੀਆ ਖਸਮ ਨ ਪਾਏ ਸਾਦੁ ॥

translation.text: he may talk as much as he wants, but he shall not be pleasing to his Master.

transliteration.text: galā karē ghanērīā khasam n pāē sād .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

text: ਆਪੁ ਗਵਾਇ ਸੇਵਾ ਕਰੇ ਤਾ ਕਿਛੁ ਪਾਏ ਮਾਨੁ ॥

translation.text: But if he eliminates his self-conceit and then performs service, he shall be honored.

transliteration.text: āp gavāi sēvā karē tā kish pāē mān .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

text: ਨਾਨਕ ਜਿਸ ਨੋ ਲਗਾ ਤਿਸੁ ਮਿਲੈ ਲਗਾ ਸੋ ਪਰਵਾਨੁ ॥੧॥

translation.text: O Nanak, if he merges with the one with whom he is attached, his attachment becomes acceptable. ||1||

transliteration.text: nānak jis nō lagā tis milai lagā sō paravān .1.

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. text: ਜੋ ਜੀਇ ਹੋਇ ਸੁ ਉਗਵੈ ਮੁਹ ਕਾ ਕਹਿਆ ਵਾਉ ॥

translation.text: Whatever is in the mind, comes forth; spoken words by themselves are just wind.

transliteration.text: jō jīi hōi s ugavai muh kā kahiā vāu .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. text: ਬੀਜੇ ਬਿਖੁ ਮੰਗੈ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤੁ ਵੇਖਹੁ ਏਹੁ ਨਿਆਉ ॥੨॥

translation.text: He sows seeds of poison, and demands Ambrosial Nectar. Behold - what justice is this? ||2||

transliteration.text: bījē bikh mangai anmrit vēkhah ēh niāu .2.

text: ਨਾਲਿ ਇਆਣੇ ਦੋਸਤੀ ਕਦੇ ਨ ਆਵੈ ਰਾਸਿ ॥

translation.text: Friendship with a fool never works out right.

transliteration.text: nāl iānē dōsatī kadē n āvai rās .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. text: ਜੇਹਾ ਜਾਣੈ ਤੇਹੋ ਵਰਤੈ ਵੇਖਹੁ ਕੋ ਨਿਰਜਾਸਿ ॥

translation.text: As he knows, he acts; behold, and see that it is so.

transliteration.text: jēhā jānai tēhō varatai vēkhah kō nirajās .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. text: ਵਸਤੂ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਵਸਤੁ ਸਮਾਵੈ ਦੂਜੀ ਹੋਵੈ ਪਾਸਿ ॥

translation.text: One thing can be absorbed into another thing, but duality keeps them apart.

transliteration.text: vasatū andar vasat samāvai dūjī hōvai pās .

text: ਸਾਹਿਬ ਸੇਤੀ ਹੁਕਮੁ ਨ ਚਲੈ ਕਹੀ ਬਣੈ ਅਰਦਾਸਿ ॥

translation.text: No one can issue commands to the Lord Master; offer instead humble prayers.

transliteration.text: sāhib sētī hukam n chalai kahī banai aradās .

text: ਕੂੜਿ ਕਮਾਣੈ ਕੂੜੋ ਹੋਵੈ ਨਾਨਕ ਸਿਫਤਿ ਵਿਗਾਸਿ ॥੩॥

translation.text: Practicing falsehood, only falsehood is obtained. O Nanak, through the Lord's Praise, one blossoms forth. ||3||

transliteration.text: kūr kamānai kūrō hōvai nānak siphat vigās .3.

text: ਹੋਇ ਇਆਣਾ ਕਰੇ ਕੰਮੁ ਆਣਿ ਨ ਸਕੈ ਰਾਸਿ ॥

translation.text: If a fool does a job, he cannot do it right.

text: ਜੇ ਇਕ ਅਧ ਚੰਗੀ ਕਰੇ ਦੂਜੀ ਭੀ ਵੇਰਾਸਿ ॥੫॥

translation.text: Even if he does something right, he does the next thing wrong. ||5||

translation.text: If a servant, performing service, obeys the Will of his Master,

text: ਹੁਰਮਤਿ ਤਿਸ ਨੋ ਅਗਲੀ ਓਹੁ ਵਜਹੁ ਭਿ ਦੂਣਾ ਖਾਇ ॥

translation.text: his honor increases, and he receives double his wages.

transliteration.text: huramat tis nō agalī ōh vajah bh dūnā khāi .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. text: ਖਸਮੈ ਕਰੇ ਬਰਾਬਰੀ ਫਿਰਿ ਗੈਰਤਿ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਪਾਇ ॥

translation.text: But if he claims to be equal to his Master, he earns his Master's displeasure.

transliteration.text: khasamai karē barābarī phir gairat andar pāi .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. text: ਵਜਹੁ ਗਵਾਏ ਅਗਲਾ ਮੁਹੇ ਮੁਹਿ ਪਾਣਾ ਖਾਇ ॥

translation.text: He loses his entire salary, and is also beaten on his face with shoes.

transliteration.text: vajah gavāē agalā muhē muh pānā khāi .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. Guru Angad Dev [1504 - 1552], originally called Bhai Lehna, was born at Harike, a small village in the Ferozepur district. His father was named Pheru and worked as a small businessman.

Bhai Lehna always did everything that Guru Nanak asked, which is why Guru Nanak renamed Bhai Lehna as his Ang or limb of his body.

Guru Angad Dev simplified the old Punjabi characters into a new alphabet, called Gurmukhi. He thus gave the people the gift of literature. He took great interest in the education of children and opened several schools.

text: ਜਿਸ ਦਾ ਦਿਤਾ ਖਾਵਣਾ ਤਿਸੁ ਕਹੀਐ ਸਾਬਾਸਿ ॥

translation.text: Let us all celebrate Him, from whom we receive our nourishment.

transliteration.text: jis dā ditā khāvanā tis kahīai sābās .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

author.author: Guru Angad Dev
author.description:

text: ਨਾਨਕ ਹੁਕਮੁ ਨ ਚਲਈ ਨਾਲਿ ਖਸਮ ਚਲੈ ਅਰਦਾਸਿ ॥੨੨॥

translation.text: O Nanak, no one can issue commands to the Lord Master; let us offer prayers instead. ||22||

transliteration.text: nānak hukam n chalaī nāl khasam chalai aradās .22.

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.
